text: Zygaspis dolichomenta is a worm lizard species in the family Amphisbaenidae. It is endemic to the Democratic Republic of the Congo. ==References== Category:Zygaspis Category:Reptiles of the Democratic Republic of the Congo Category:Endemic fauna of the Democratic Republic of the Congo Category:Taxa named by Gaston-François de Witte Category:Taxa named by Raymond Laurent Category:Reptiles described in 1942
title: Zygaspis dolichomenta
